title: Surprises galore, VAR success and the possibility of a one-horse title race: Six things this Premier League season has taught us
text:
Few could have predicted the Premier League table would have looked this way eight games into the 2019/20 campaign.

The status quo looks very much like it will be upset this year with surprises at both ends of the table. Here are six things we have learned from the Premier League season so far…

The title race could be over by Christmas

Liverpool have established an eight-point lead after just eight games. Incredibly they have, therefore, taken a point a game more than second-placed Manchester City and while the perceived wisdom is that it will be a two-horse title race the dynamic has to shift quickly – otherwise Liverpool could even be too far ahead before they play each other on November 10...
description: Few could have predicted the Premier League table would have looked this way eight games into the 2019/20 campaign.
